title: This Quick Transmigration Experience Is a Bit Sweet - Novel Updates
tags: Alternate World   Clever Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Devoted Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Persistent Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Seme Protagonist   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping   Yandere
author: 常念君
description: This is a transmigration story following Zong Yuan and his system, 0046. In each world that he transmigrates to, he has to finish a mission but those missions somehow always revolve around the same person each time… With a new identity and personality in each world, the two male protagonists encounter and fall for each other over and over again.>
